name: GZCL Method (T1/T2/T3 Layers)
time_per_session_breakdown: T1 main lift ~15 min, T2 10-15 min, T3 5-10 min
train_to_failure: no (1-2 RIR in T1/T2, T3 can push further)
overview_and_execution: Tier1 = main heavy lift (1-5 reps). Tier2 = secondary lifts (6-10 reps). Tier3 = accessories (10-20 reps). Each tier has a target total rep range. Increase weight or reps once you hit target consistently.
example_application: Squat T1: 3×3 heavy, T2: 3×8 front squat moderate, T3: 3×12 lunges. Each tier hits volume goals.
important_notes: Great for well-rounded strength & size. Flexible. Keep track of rep goals per tier and progress systematically.
volume_metrics: Tier1 ~10-15 reps, Tier2 ~20-30 reps, Tier3 ~30+ reps
